'); } String(data).replace(/>,/g, '>'); } else { '

header:
<js>
headers={
	"User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 11; V1981A) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/107.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36",
	"Referer": Get('url'),
"Cookie": "ckc=1;",
}
JSON.stringify(headers)
</js>

ruleContent.content:
let domain = "."; function addOptions(url, options) { let headers = { Referer: baseUrl.replace(/,[\s\S]+\}/,"") }; if (!url.includes(domain)) { headers.Referer = ""; } options = options || {}; options.headers = Object.assign(options.headers || {}, headers); return options ? `${url},${JSON.stringify(options)}` : url; } function toImg(url, func, options) { let generateImgTag = (u) => ``; let generateHtml = (u, i, t) => typeof func == "function" ? generateImgTag(func(u, i, t)) : generateImgTag(u); return Array.isArray(url) ? url.map(generateHtml).join("\n") : generateHtml(url.toString()); } function load(urls) { for (let url of urls) { let response = java.ajax(url); if (!/exception/.test(response)){ return [response, url]; } } throw "Error: 所有链接下载失败"; } function parseKey(jsUrl) { let jsBaseUrls = [ "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/xiaohan231/decodeObfuscator/main/", "https://raw.githubusercontents.com/xiaohan231/decodeObfuscator/main/", "https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/xiaohan231/decodeObfuscator@main/" ]; let urls = [ "plugins/common.js", "plugins/manwa.js", "plugins/evalPacker.js", "tools/babel_asttool.js", "tools/config.js", "tools/decode.js", "tools/decodeOb.js", "tools/usefulPlugins.js", ]; let jsBaseUrl = cache.get("decodeObfuscator"); if (!jsBaseUrl) { jsBaseUrl = load(jsBaseUrls)[1]; cache.put("decodeObfuscator", jsBaseUrl); } String.prototype.toAbsUrl = function() { return /^\.\/|^http|^content|^\/sdcard|^\/storage/.test(this) ? this : jsBaseUrl.concat(this); }; function loadJS(urls) { return jsBaseUrl && urls.map(url => script(java.importScript(url.toAbsUrl()))).join("\n") || ""; } function script(content) { return ``; } let html = `${loadJS(urls)}`; let key = JSON.parse(java.webView(html, Get('url'), "keys"))[0]; return key; } if (String(book['author']) !== "xiaohan231") { let DEBUG = 0; let origin = Get('url'); let chjs = src.match(/['"](.*?ch.js\?v=(\d+))/); if (DEBUG || (chjs && chjs[2] != 202208132)) { cache.put("manwa_aes_key", parseKey(chjs[1])); } let imgs = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(src) .select(".content-img") .toArray() .map(v => { let dataRsrc = v.attr("data-r-src"); return dataRsrc ? dataRsrc : ""; }) .filter(v => v !== ""); if (DEBUG) { imgs.splice(1); } var result = toImg(imgs, null, { headers: { origin: origin } }); result; } else { '
'; }

女生::/mm/<,{{page}}.html>
全本::/finish/<,{{page}}.html>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
var n;
if
((result.match(/ \/ (\d+) 页/))!=null){
n=result.match(/ \/ (\d+) 页/)[1];
var list=[];
for(let i=1;i<=n;i++){
if(/page/.test(baseUrl)){
	list.push({k:'第'+i+'页',v:baseUrl.replace(/page(?:%3D|=)\d+/g,'&page='+i)});
	}else{
		list.push({k:'第'+i+'页',v:baseUrl.split(",")[0]+'&page='+i+',{"webView":true}'});
		}
}
}else if(!/返回列表/.test(src)){
list =''
}else{
var list=[{k:'第1页',v:baseUrl}];
}
java.log(JSON.stringify(list))
list
</js>

ruleContent.content:
let domain = String(Get('url')).split(".")[1]; function addOptions(url, baseUrl, options) { let j = { "Referer": baseUrl.replace(/,[\s\S]+\}/, "") }; if (!url.includes(domain)) { j.Referer = ""; } options = options || {}; options.headers = Object.assign(options.headers || {}, j); return options ? `${url},${JSON.stringify(options)}` : url; } function arrayToImg(arr, func, baseUrl, options) { let result = []; for (let item of arr) { let imgUrl = addOptions(item, baseUrl, options); let imgTag = ``; if (typeof func === "function") { imgTag = func(imgUrl); } result.push(imgTag); } return result.join("\n"); } function stringToImg(str, func, baseUrl, options) { let imgUrl = addOptions(str, baseUrl, options); let imgTag = ``; if (typeof func === "function") { imgTag = func(imgUrl); } return imgTag; } function load(urls) { for (let url of urls) { let response = java.ajax(url); if (!/exception/.test(response)) { return [response, url]; } } throw "Error: 所有链接下载失败"; } function parseKeys() { let jsBaseUrls = ["https://raw.githubusercontents.com/xiaohan231/decodeObfuscator/main/", "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/xiaohan231/decodeObfuscator/main/", "https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/xiaohan231/decodeObfuscator@main/"]; let urls = ["plugins/common.js", "plugins/cocomanhua.js", "tools/babel_asttool.js", "tools/config.js", "tools/decode.js", "tools/decodeOb.js", "tools/usefulPlugins.js"]; let jsBaseUrl = cache.get(`cache_${Get('url')}`); if (!jsBaseUrl) { jsBaseUrl = load(jsBaseUrls)[1]; java.toast(jsBaseUrl); cache.put(`cache_${Get('url')}`, jsBaseUrl); } function toAbsUrl(url) { return /^\.\/|^http|^content|^\/sdcard|^\/storage/.test(url) ? url : jsBaseUrl.concat(url); } function loadJS(urls) { let scripts = ""; for (let url of urls) { let absoluteUrl = toAbsUrl(url); let content = java.ajax(absoluteUrl); let scriptTag = script(content); scripts += scriptTag; } return scripts; } function script(content) { return ``; } let html = `${loadJS(urls)}`; return java.webView(html, Get('url'), "keys"); } if (String(book['author']) !== "xiaohan231") { let DEBUG = 0; let local_keys = null; function base64Decode(base64) { return java.base64Decode(base64) + ""; } let aes = { keys: null, retryNum: 1, saveKeys: function (keysString) { try { this.keys = JSON.parse(keysString); let localKeys = cache.get('keysString'); if (localKeys !== keysString) { cache.put('keysString', keysString); return true; } } catch (e) { java.log(keysString); java.log("❎密钥解析错误！！"); } }, _aesDecrypt: function (key, word) { return java.createSymmetricCrypto("aes/ecb/pkcs7padding", key).decryptStr(word) + ""; }, decrypt: function (word, name) { if (this.keys && this.keys[name]) { for (let key of this.keys[name]) { try { return this._aesDecrypt(key, word); } catch {} } } if (this.retryNum-- > 0) { if (this.saveKeys(parseKeys())) { return this.decrypt(word, name); } } throw "❎解密失败，无法获取密钥！！"; } }; function decodeImage(src) { let C_DATA = src.match(/C_DATA\s*=\s*\S([\s\S]+?)['"]/); if (!C_DATA) { throw "❎图片数据C_DATA获取失败！！"; } C_DATA = aes.decrypt(base64Decode(C_DATA[1]), "C_DATA"); DEBUG && java.log(C_DATA); eval(C_DATA); let html = ""; if (!image_info.img_type) { let path = mh_info.enc_code2 ? aes.decrypt(base64Decode(mh_info.enc_code2), "enc_code2") : mh_info.imgpath; let totalImageCount = mh_info.enc_code1 ? aes.decrypt(base64Decode(mh_info.enc_code1), "enc_code1") : mh_info.totalimg; let servers = [mh_info.domain]; if (typeof __JS_READLINE !== "undefined") { if (__JS_READLINE.data && __JS_READLINE.data.length > 0) { servers.push(__JS_READLINE.data[0].domain); } else if (__JS_READLINE.domain) { servers.push(__JS_READLINE.domain); } } let server = mh_info.use_server === "" ? servers[0] : servers[0].replace(/^img/, `img${mh_info.use_server}`); let options = {}; let suffix = "jpg"; if (image_info.imgKey !== undefined && image_info.imgKey !== '' || image_info.keyType !== undefined && image_info.keyType !== '') { if (image_info.keyType === '0') { colakey = aes.decrypt(image_info.imgKey, "C_DATA"); } else { let colajsUrls = ["https://qyyuapi.com/cola.js"]; let colajs = cache.get(`cache_colajs_${Get('url')}`); let currentHash = colajs ? java.md5Encode(colajs) : null; for (let i = 0; i < colajsUrls.length; i++) { try { let response = java.ajax(colajsUrls[i]); let newHash = java.md5Encode(response); if (newHash !== currentHash) { colajs = response; cache.put(`cache_colajs_${Get('url')}`, colajs); break; } } catch (e) { java.log(`❎加载${colajsUrls[i]}密钥文件错误`); } }; {{cache.get(`cache_colajs_${Get('url')}`);}} colakey = ImgKey(image_info.keyType); if (colakey == '' || colakey == null) { java.log(`❎远程密钥文件未更新，请30分钟后再试`); } } options = { "key": enc_webp_bytes_key = colakey, "headers": { "Cookie": `_tka_${mh_info.pageid}=${path};_tkb_${mh_info.pageid}=${totalImageCount}`, "Origin": Get('url') } }; suffix = "enc.webp"; } if (DEBUG) totalImageCount = 1; for (; mh_info.startimg <= totalImageCount; mh_info.startimg++) { let imgPath = `https://${server}/comic/${encodeURIComponent(path)}${String(mh_info.startimg).padStart(4, "0")}.${suffix}`; html += stringToImg(imgPath, null, baseUrl, options) + "\n"; } } else { let urls__direct = base64Decode(image_info.urls__direct).split("|SEPARATER|"); if (DEBUG) urls__direct.splice(0, 1); if (image_info.img_type === 1) { html = arrayToImg(urls__direct, url => url + ".webp", baseUrl); } else { html = arrayToImg(urls__direct, null, baseUrl); } } return html; } (function () { if (local_keys !== null && local_keys !== '') { aes.keys = local_keys; } else if (cache.get('keysString') !== null && cache.get('keysString') !== '') { aes.saveKeys(cache.get('keysString')); } else { aes.retryNum = 1; DEBUG && aes.saveKeys(parseKeys()); } return decodeImage(src); })(); } else { '
'; }
